column5: Does anyone know if the new walleye regulations on lotw passed? I talked to a couple different Canadians while out fishing and they thought it had…. I can’t seem to find anything stating that. Thanks!
The 2023 regulations still show one over 46 cm for LOTW. Don't know if this is the kind of thing that could change in the middle of a year, but kind of doubt it.
I believe there is a daily catch limit of 2 instead of the usual 4 for Canadian residents on LOTW. Possession limit of 4.
Avoiding the real problem and punishing fishermen.
There have been zero changes to the LOTW's fishing regulations.
I was told the same thing from a camp owner on the opposite side of LOTW. (North end)
Yes my bad no changes as stated by others.

I just received an email back from the Ontario MNRF. According to them the size based regulation (slot) changes will go into effect on Jan 1, 2024. It is a bit more of a process to change the catch/possession limits so that may take up to another year and most likely go into effect Jan 1, 2025. It was stated that Fisheries/Oceans Canada needs to approve this portion.
